modShortDescription: This mod adds several new blocks of decorative value. They can be crafted with just a few wood and are not meant for defenses.
modDescription:
New editions include a wood picket fence set, some clay vases, a few food decorations, and a tent that you can fill with other blocks.

This mod adds several new blocks of decorative value. They can be crafted with just a few wood and are not meant for defenses. Simply search ‘master’ in recipes to find the master blocks. Hold R when one is equipped to choose which block you want out of that set.

Does not require restart.

Requires client to install as well as server.

Tested and works with Alpha 20.4 (b42).

## Changelog

Updated with new blocks.

* Wood water wheel
* Wood windmill blades
* Wood 6×2 bridge (allows fishing if you have telrics fishing v2 installed)
* Ale mug
* Apple basket
* Lamp post (can turn on and off)

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xlfkien5xg2u2w2/TelricsDecorationsPackA20.zip?dl=1)** for A20  
**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/b07ywy07n3tr05g/TelricsDecorationsPackA19.zip?dl=1)** for A19

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26175-telrics-a20-modlets-new-mod-added-12132021/).
